overview: A teenage girl and a young boy run for their lives to cross 'The Line', but are they running away from danger or towards it?  Follow us on Twitter - @Dark_Pictures @fayefilm @killherwitch  https://vimeo.com/94174999
tagline: A teenage girl and a young boy run for their lives to cross 'The Line', but are they running away from danger or towards it?
title: The Line
